sys_ui_message.message: 1. Access [Workday](https://wd3.myworkday.com/absa/d/home.htmld). 2. Click on the top far right corner on your Profile (head icon). 3. Click on “View Profile”. 4. On your left, there’s list written in white on burgundy background. 5. Scroll down to and click on “Absence”, it should be 3rd from bottom. 6. Defaulted page will land you on “Absence requests” then click on “Absence balance” 7. Scroll down to “Annual leave Flex” and click on the number under “carryover balance” 8. You will get a pop up with an Expiration date, Associated balance period and units (number of hours)
